website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, compact, countertop dishwasher with easy-to-use controls and a number of helpful indicator lights.
pros: This countertop dishwasher comes with many of the same features as SPT's larger models
The unit is effortless to hook up and is able to accommodate up to 6 standard place settings per load
cons: If you have plates larger than 10.5 inches in diameter, they may not fit in this machine

customer_reviews.title: Good for small dishes.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful little dishwasher but does not fit what I considered “standard sized dishes”. Measure your dinner plates. Ours are indeed bigger than 10.25”.
customer_reviews.author: aaron f.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend for any small apartment or anyone without a dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed by this product. It is completely quiet except for when it drains water. It hooked right up to our sink and cleans the dishes. They are dry, clean, and spot free! I recommend for any small apartment or anyone without a dishwasher, I love it so much because my dishes don't pile up on my counters or shallow sink anymore. Just one thing to remember is to measure your counter space. I did right before buying this and it for perfectly under my counter.
customer_reviews.author: katelin stuchel

customer_reviews.title: MY New Best Friend!!!
customer_reviews.text: This beats the dish washer I had by a country mile!!! Really cleans great,heats the water very hot & is a push button wonder. I'm really impressed!! I can clean twice as much as I could with my former machine & it's the same size! This is a KEEPER!!!!!!!!. Forgot to mention it's so quiet that I had to keep checking when I first used it to make sure it was working!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny9

customer_reviews.title: ... owned this one for almost three months and I love it. Love not having to hand wash most ...
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this one for almost three months and I love it. Love not having to hand wash most dishes anymore. Only have to hand wash the large dishes, such as chargers or cookie sheets because the capacity of this dishwasher is small and the opening is pretty small too. But overall, this dishwasher is great. Just don't have any dishes in the sink when running the washer because the drain water comes out of the hose pretty fast and can ricochet against dishes in the sink and get all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ver Linden

customer_reviews.title: Buy it its gonna change your life
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit on my counter so I have it sitting on my sink works great good on heavy dinner dishes got my large frying pan clean that had greese and burnt seasonings stuck to the bottom in one wash I would deff recommend I hate washing dishes it does leak a bit from the connection on the back but its on the sink so its cool I just lay a towel next to it hooked up to my sink not too heavy or loud I love it
customer_reviews.author: Dorian parrish

customer_reviews.title: Does an excellent job
customer_reviews.text: We previously owned a Magic Chef countertop dishwasher which appears to have made by the same company in China, judging by the identical rack/dispenser/washer arm/filter basket etc. This dishwasher does an excellent job of cleaning the dishes, and is very quiet. It does NOT fit on our countertop - it's exactly 1/4" too tall to fit under the cabinets. As such we've got it mounted on a rolling cart. It also takes an extraordinarily long time on normal cycle - almost two full hours. However, given that it's task is getting dishes clean, and it does that well, five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our office. We are trying to reduce the use of paper cups in our offfice. We have a staff of about 20 plus visitors. We run this unit about twice a week. Typically we only put coffee mugs and drinking glasses in it. It works very well. Have had a few instances of a chalky film residue left behind. Ran some white vinegar through and fixed the issue. This has been a wonderful addition to our office kitchen and allowed us to be a little more green for our community.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome invention
customer_reviews.text: This thing is truly awesome; just note you will absolutely need someone to help you lift it out of the box unless you are very, very strong. I am a strong woman and still needed a guy to help me. Fits a solid amount of dishes and is easy to use. Also, mine had an issue a few months in and I called their customer service and a regular ol' dude picked up in one ring and helped me fix the issue quickly. Was actually shocked to speak with a live person who was so helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Silver

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is just ok, nothing great. About every 3rd or 4th wash, the dishes don't always come clean, there is a residue left on them. The organization of the rack isn't great either, I find it difficult to load my dishes n an organized fashion to optimize the room available. We have had this for a few months and there was already a leak due to the fasteners in the back coming loose from moving the hose around (from faucet back to counter).
customer_reviews.author: Katie Markle

customer_reviews.title: Works as good  as a standard dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. A life quality upgrade.. especially for a single mom....we have an all day buffet here since Covid, and there is only 2 of us. Dishes are dry so long as I leave them in for an hour after cycle ends. Of course it is noisy, not more than a normal dishwasher though. It has to crane through the sink. so I don’t run it after 9:00 pm. Fits on countertop easily. Easy for me to lift and install....and I am no body builder. I hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Countertop Dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: How did I not buy this sooner. Amazing Countertop Dishwasher. Quiet. VERY easy to install. CLEANS the dishes, saves water and electricity. Doesn't take up too much counter space. I can't say enough good things about this dishwasher. I've had it for a month and I'm just too, too, too happy I got it. I'm trying to come up with a down side and the only thing I can think of is in regard to the filters. I can't get the 2 mesh filters to come apart and I'm afraid I'll break one or both if I force them. Doesn't seem to matter though. My dishes and glasses just sparkle.
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite compact
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy little dishwasher that even my daughter hasn’t been able to kill. My daughter has destroyed three other dishwashers. We got this one because it’s easy to clean the trap. We’ve had it now for several months. It cleans the dishes really well and we are all pretty happy with it. It fits on my counter next to the sink. We live in an older mobile home and we have not been able to get a larger dishwasher installed so we have been using various compact and portable models. This is the best one.
customer_reviews.author: Floof Mom

customer_reviews.title: Decent little dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen, subfloor and pipes has to be replaced . It will be awhile before I have a full kitchen again. This dishwasher is 40lb so it’s easy enough to move. I hook it up to the bathroom sink when needing it. It works pretty good. It’s pretty quiet. It will not fit the 12” dinner plates but I actually don’t use those often. I use the smaller plates. Make sure you look at the measurements and measure your countertops for fit. Might even work in an RV if you have room to store it. I might keep this one in my kitchen shed when done in house.
customer_reviews.author: WindyThistleFarm

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I like that it fits into a kitchen with limited space. It also is quieter when running than I had anticipated. But I am unhappy that it does not rinse the dishes thoroughly - leaves a granular residue. I'm sure it's due to the design of the dishwasher because the farther the dish items are from the center, the more residue is left on them.
customer_reviews.author: Erin H.

customer_reviews.title: This was one of my BEST purchases EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Although I was very skeptical, I found that it is NOT the soap that cleans the dishes properly; it's the dishwasher!! I've used the same soap in other dishwashers and had lousy results! In this " Little Giant" my glasses come out clean, clear and spot free!! Costs me less not to have to use high end pouches!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and works great.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I didn't wait so long to purchase. Has made my life so much easier. I recently becane partially disabled and having this dishwasher has made washing dishes so much better. It is very easy to use, the machine is quite, the only noise is when the water is being drained. Would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I should've bought this years ago
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic dishwasher. It took about 15 minutes to unpack and setup. No leaks. No tools needed. Normal plates fit fine. Everything was included hoses and adaptor.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC! Great Dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. I've owned several countertop dishwashers and this is probably the best one ever. I use Cascade (I've tried other brands) and I don't even have to wipe down the wine glasses!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Regular

customer_reviews.title: Ugh. Frustrated.
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, directions appear simple. My plates aren't giant...but they definitely take some strategic placement to get them in and I can only fit 4 instead of 7. Now...ready to go.. But the water won't fill. The light isn't turning on saying it's filling and although my water is turned on, nothing. I'm super irritated right now.
customer_reviews.author: Just BElieve

customer_reviews.title: 3rd SPT Dishwasher, 3rd Flood
customer_reviews.text: These units last about 2 years, then they break. Tonight, my unit did not drain and caused a flood in my kitchen. I usually buy a new unit once every 2 years. But now I will try another brand. But when it works, it's good.
customer_reviews.author: P. Ma

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: We live in a one bedroom apartment with a small kitchen it fits perfectly on our counter top. The dish washer holds a lot surprisingly it also can hold a lot of pots and pans. Cleans so well and does not leave streaks or extra bits of food behind! Highly recommend this no more fights over doing the dishes. It’s not loud at all and was super easy to hook up to the sink.
customer_reviews.author: RobVanderMay

customer_reviews.title: IT DIDN"T WORK AT ALL.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Dishwasher. it didn't work at all. it is a heavy unit after open it up, and installation, and placing some dishes, it didn't work. please do not buy it. you wasting your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Kourosh

customer_reviews.title: The directions for set up were easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: The dishwasher works well and my dishes come out very clean. Unfortunately, my large plates do not fit in the unit so they have to be washed by hand.. The directions for set up were easy to understand, which is huge because I usually have problems.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Crapped out after 1 month and 1 week.
customer_reviews.text: Crapped out after 1 month and 1 week. I'll be calling support shortly. Watch for an updated review. However that goes, I still shouldn't have to call support after 1 month and 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: matthew devney

customer_reviews.title: No time, get this.
customer_reviews.text: It works great if your super busy like me. For the price , space and time it saved me is priceless. It does not dry as well as I hoped but that was mentioned in other reviews. I would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Rad

customer_reviews.title: Family of 5 and it's doing great
customer_reviews.text: This is a work horse and I pack it full over full buy good soap and you'll have no problems I've had 2 things I ran though twice but everything else comes out clean
customer_reviews.author: James Wardell

customer_reviews.title: junk!!
customer_reviews.text: this dishwasher is junk!! the hoses dont attach where they are supposed to go and i cant get it to stop leaking!!! there is no water going into the machine to even get it to run!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Genosky

customer_reviews.title: Cleans halfway well rinses poorly
customer_reviews.text: Had it a year, have to go through rinse cycle 2 or 3 times after every wash. The "dry" cycle is useless if the suds are built up in the bottom to the bottom, touching the dishes. Then you have to go through another rinse cycle or two to clear them out. You cannot take out the rack to get the suds out before rinsing because it will then drip everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: No Name

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small dishwasher! Wisn I bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Fits a lot of dishes in it for its size! If you need/want a small dishwasher like me, I got this for my small apartment and is perfect! Wish I bought this sooner! Well built too. Not flimsy at all. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nonya B

customer_reviews.title: It was good till it broke
customer_reviews.text: Ive had the product for 3 weeks and then the pipe that dumps the water burst and then there was water all over my kitchen. It was nice until it broke.
customer_reviews.author: george m.

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully, quiet, convenient. I have mobility issues, so standing and washing dishes turned into a painful task every day. So glad I found this. Didn't know they made them this small. I love, love, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: waist of money
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to use this product because the hose connection is not for USA standard pipe fittings 😒 I wish I had known that. The hoses are too short to reach the sink Plus its a lot bigger than a microwave It takes up a lot of counter space huge Bulky
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Gee

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I got it damaged so not to happy but I am tired of doing dishes by had so I am keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Since getting this machine my kitchen stays cleaner and more organized! I am not fond of washing dishes and do a lot of canning. It helps me keep everything done up! Only regret is wish I bought sooner! Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Finneran

customer_reviews.title: definitely returning
customer_reviews.text: It leaks and doesn’t work properly. I just got it yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Ehh. Does the job, BUT.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, but relatively small. We have a set of plates and such from Walmart and you're not able to stand the dishes up where they're supposed to go. They have to be tilted and take up more space.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbi Bonnaville

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet, does a great job on all my dishes.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has the cheapest price I could find. It took 5 minutes to set up. Worked perfect on first use. A great little machine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: otherwise everything was fine.
customer_reviews.text: There's no time posted or what IT'S doing. Everyting MUST b cleaned b4 putting in. I always rinse everything off anyway, but i put a glass in that i had soaking from choc milk 2x's, finally i had to get a brush and wash by hand. Waisted time. I bought it so I DON'T have to wash by hand, otherwise everything was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Wiles

customer_reviews.title: I appreciate it. This is my first experience with ...
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate it. This is my first experience with a dish washer. I will definitely be getting a bigger one when i can.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda lily

customer_reviews.title: Received this sooner thsn expected.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the performance. Did not expect this dishwasher to be so quiet. Also quite surprised at how much it holds for only having 1 rack. We are very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: He cleans really good totally worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised this thing cleans really good the dishes come out hot and steamy totally worth the money 100% recommended
customer_reviews.author: zombie family

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest thing I ever bought myself! I hated doing dishes by hand, and this little guy only takes up about 1.5 ft of counter top. Just make sure everything is secure when you set it up, or else you will end up with a wet kitchen :)
customer_reviews.author: Emily Eineichner

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son & his girlfriend for their dishwasherless apartment. They love it cause they have a baby. Works great and has a surprising amount of room.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Boncorddo

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! It fits on my countertop, was very easy to set up, less than 10 minutes. Works great, dishes are super clean! I'm never going back to scrubbing by hand!!! the first time I set it up I just stared at it in amazement that the dishes were doing themselves!!! I have been washing them by hand for 17 years.
customer_reviews.author: Erica R. Cope

customer_reviews.title: Great design and size!
customer_reviews.text: Great countertop dishwasher. Easy setup, large interior capacity, and things come out clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kleeman7

customer_reviews.title: Love this Machine!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. I really hate washing dishes and my significant other can be a little lazy. I've had it for a month and I can honestly say it's a must have for small apartments.
customer_reviews.author: SinisterHeart

customer_reviews.title: My tenants love it.
customer_reviews.text: A little large to sit on countertop. But it works great...
customer_reviews.author: D. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Nice little dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Nice little dishwasher! We put ours on a small cart with wheels so we could roll it out when we needed it, but store it when it wasn't being used. It worked great and I had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Keach

customer_reviews.title: and he couldn’t be happier. He built a wood cart with wheels and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas 2017 for my dad to go in his RV (his full time home), and he couldn’t be happier. He built a wood cart with wheels and rolls it up to sink to use, and back to wall when finished. He said the dishes come out spotless and the unit is so quiet he can’t even tell it’s running from his bedroom. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer may

customer_reviews.title: Great dish washer for 2 people. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Bigger than i expectef but fits on counter. Just right for 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet and very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Life-changer I measured wrong but I'm making it work and it works fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Forgetta

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my daughter she loves it thankyou
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: skeptical at first, excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have known about this sooner would have saved years of handwashing. Surprisingly high quality for price and size couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In terms of space this is a nice dishwasher for the price however the product came damaged ...
customer_reviews.text: In terms of space this is a nice dishwasher for the price however the product came damaged however could be due to shipment
customer_reviews.author: Keegan Baehler

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 18 months.
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine, but stopped turning on after a year and half of use.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: It simply does not clean well
customer_reviews.text: It has a very long cycle and does not clean dishes well and leaves a white film on dishes. If it were not such a hassle to box up I would ship it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: GARRY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: He loved it! It's the perfect size for the small apartment. Works great. Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: rosebudtattoo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: A life saver during Covid crisis ...staying home , to many to wash..
customer_reviews.author: Rudy the Rag Doll.

customer_reviews.title: Sparkling clean
customer_reviews.text: Love it after 4 years of hand washing nice to have a dishwasher. Live alone so the size is good. Fits most of my dishes.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Works great and very easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Lies

customer_reviews.title: information on product
customer_reviews.text: l liked the dishwasher i ordered. i like the way the order arrived on time and i am really enjoying my new dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: maryann

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: It's a little bigger than I thought but so far it's working great and I love it anyway
customer_reviews.author: heather h.

customer_reviews.title: Very,very useful in small apartment
customer_reviews.text: Liked very much, second product of the same, used it to replace older worned product,extensively used once purchased
customer_reviews.author: Louis Perez

customer_reviews.title: Dish washer
customer_reviews.text: Was happy when i recieved it. Just wished it had a dry cycle on it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelle Benbrahim

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: mine arrived dented. It’s just cosmetic and doesn’t interfere with function, but still... it’s kinda annoying to shell out $$$ and have it arrive dented...
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice apartment amenity
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well! It can take a while, but it sure beats doing them by hand. Covinient universal hookup.
customer_reviews.author: Kaden Bond

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It works great except that it does not dry the dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Todd

customer_reviews.title: Freaking phenomenal machine. Stop living without a dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: It takes about 1 hour 45 for the normal cycle. My girlfriend couldn't believe such a thing existed, or how good of a job it did. I will never go back to not having a dishwasher. If you're hesitating on whether or not to get one, just do it. It's totally been worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: iAmJTP

customer_reviews.title: Works just like a regular dishwasher. It’s great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with it. Better than I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Overall great unit get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I like the compactness of the machine, but Hard to fit plates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It will arrive dented, but works OK
customer_reviews.text: It will arrive dented, just go ahead and accept it, 1st and second one both. Quiet. Does OK job. If you don't want dents, you have to go to a place where you can pick it up, and check through their stock carefully
customer_reviews.author: gomer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The machine is broken in the second time usages. It shows overflow error, and the detergent foam was always in the base pan when a cycle finished. I think it is mechanic low quality and mechanic problem. I want to return, but find it is not free. This purchase is the worst one in my experience in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Xinyu Zhang
